controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program cover government bodies as customers?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to verify that a government body exists and (where applicable) provide information about beneficial owners?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for verifying government body existence and beneficial ownership information.

controls.label: Does your procedure for government bodies include collection of: (1) full name, (2) principal place of operations address, (3) Commonwealth status, and (4) State/Territory/foreign country status?
controls.detail-label: Describe how your procedure collects these four categories of KYC information.

controls.label: Do your risk-based systems and controls determine whether to collect additional KYC information beyond the minimum specified in paragraph 4.8.3?
controls.detail-label: Describe how your risk-based assessment determines whether additional KYC information is required.

controls.label: Does your procedure verify information collected under paragraph 4.8.3 using reliable and independent documentation, electronic data, or a combination of both?
controls.detail-label: Describe the verification methods and sources you use (documentation, electronic data, or combination).

controls.label: Do your risk-based systems and controls determine whether to verify any additional KYC information collected under paragraph 4.8.4?
controls.detail-label: Describe how your risk assessment determines whether additional KYC information should be verified.

controls.label: For foreign government entities, do your risk-based systems and controls determine whether to collect KYC information about ownership or control?
controls.detail-label: Describe how your risk-based systems determine the need to collect beneficial ownership or control information for foreign government bodies.

controls.label: For foreign government entities, do your risk-based systems and controls determine whether to verify ownership or control information using reliable and independent sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you verify beneficial ownership or control information for foreign government bodies (documentation, electronic data, or combination).

controls.label: Do your risk-based systems and controls include a process to respond to discrepancies identified during verification to determine whether you remain reasonably satisfied about government body existence and beneficial ownership information?
controls.detail-label: Describe your process for identifying, investigating, and resolving discrepancies in government body information.

groups.title: Customer Due Diligence — Government Bodies
groups.description: AML/CTF program requirements for government body customers, including identification, verification, and risk-based systems.

groups.title: General CDD Obligation and Risk Assessment Framework
groups.description: Establish whether your program covers government bodies and implement the required risk-based systems and controls framework.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Collect minimum identifying information about government bodies (name, address, jurisdiction information) and assess need for additional information.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Verify collected information using reliable and independent sources, and determine whether additional collected information requires verification.

groups.title: Foreign Government Beneficial Ownership
groups.description: Apply risk-based assessment to determine whether to collect and verify ownership or control information for foreign government entities.

groups.title: Discrepancy Handling
groups.description: Respond to discrepancies identified during verification to ensure reasonable satisfaction about government body details.
